net.letscode.game.api.controller.player

Class PlayerChatController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.letscode.game.api.controller.player.PlayerChatController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller, ChatController

    public class PlayerChatController
extends Object
implements ChatController
    Defines a basic player chat controller, which handles messages coming from a client, and dispatches them to the ChatZone for the player entity.

    Note that the this controller is specific to the client; a new controller would need to be created to be used with a different ClientSession.

    Author:
    timothyb89
